verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came again unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against them;

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, against my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, when it was <S%H2490>profaned<s%>; and against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when it was <S%H8074>desolate<s%>; and against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, when they <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>;

Behold, therefore I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee to the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> for a <S%H4181>possession<s%>, and they shall <S%H3427>set<s%> their <S%H2918>palaces<s%> in thee, and <S%H5414>make<s%> their <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> in thee: they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thy <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> thy <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> a <S%H5116>stable<s%> for <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%> a <S%H4769>couchingplace<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because thou hast <S%H4222>clapped<s%> thine <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H7554>stamped<s%> with the <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> in <S%H5315>heart<s%> with all thy <S%H7589>despite<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

Behold, therefore I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon thee, and will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee for a <S%H957%H897>spoil<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>; and I will cut thee <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will cause thee to <S%H6>perish<s%> out of the <S%H776>countries<s%>: I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> thee; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H3282>Because<s%> that <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and <S%H8165>Seir<s%> do <S%H559>say<s%>, Behold, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is like unto all the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>;

Therefore, behold, I will <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> from the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, from his <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are on his <S%H7097>frontiers<s%>, the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%>, <S%H1020>Beth-jeshimoth<s%>, <S%H1186>Baal-meon<s%>, and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%>,

Unto the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> with the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them in <S%H4181>possession<s%>, that the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%> may not be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because that <S%H123>Edom<s%> hath <S%H6213>dealt<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by <S%H5358>taking<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, and hath <S%H816>greatly<s%> <S%H816>offended<s%>, and <S%H5358>revenged<s%> himself upon them;

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; I will also stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> from it; and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> it <S%H2723>desolate<s%> from <S%H8487>Teman<s%>; and they of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon <S%H123>Edom<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and they shall <S%H6213>do<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%> according to mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and according to my <S%H2534>fury<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

¶ Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H5360>revenge<s%>, and have <S%H5358>taken<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> with a <S%H7589>despiteful<s%> <S%H5315>heart<s%>, to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> it for the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H342>hatred<s%>;

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3774>Cherethims<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>coast<s%>.

And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon them with <S%H2534>furious<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon them.
